oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nannie Haskins and friends
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Carte de visite showing Nannie E. Haskins (front row, left) and her three friends Hattie Donoho, Janie Moore, and Dora Judkins.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Civil wars; Women

United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865; United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865 -- Women; United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865 -- Personal narratives; Tennessee - History -- Civil War, 1861-1865
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Nannie E. Haskins (1846-1930) was a native of Clarksville, TN and kept diaries of her experiences during the Civil War. In 1870 she married Henry Philips Williams and moved to Birmingham, AL.
